name: DecBin
description:
This is my first Ludum Dare game and i had lots of fun doing it, i used Game Maker for the first time as well to do make it.
Hope you enjoy it ^^

Instructions:

In this game, you have to survive for 10 seconds. If you manage to survive the level will change and will be harder, if you want to win you have to survive the three levels available.
You are the little triangle and will die in just 1 one shot, avoid the circles and the squares! You have to kill at least something every 2 seconds if you don't want to lose.

On the left you there is a Dec counter, it's a timer about how long you survived in the level.

On the right there is a Bin counter, it's a timer and it last 2 seconds, you will see it in binary so:
0 = 00
1 = 01
2 = 10

The bin counter should not be 10->2 seconds because you will lose, to restart the timer just kill something.

To move use WASD and to shoot use the mouse :)
